characterDescription: Cenn was a fifteen-year-old soldier in Amaram's army who reminded Kaladin of his younger brother Tien. Due to this reminder, Kaladin arranged for Cenn to be transferred from Gare's squad to his squad in order to protect Cenn. Even so, Cenn was killed by a Shardbearer during his first battle.

characterDetails.Notes: *According to Brandon, this is not a reference to Hoid.
